title: REST API
description: A generic connector for accessing HTTP and REST APIs .

httpRequestTrigger.title: HTTP request
httpRequestTrigger.description: Will send a GET/POST/PUT/DELETE HTTP request and parse the response back to the flow

dontThrowErrorFlg.label: Don`t throw Error on Failed Calls

resultTransformExpression.label: Result JSONata Transform Expression
resultTransformExpression.note: After making the request, one can apply the above JSONata expression to the resulting output before it is passed to the next step.  Note that the structure of the message will change based on whether or not Errors on failed calls are thrown.

splitResult.label: Split Result if it is an Array
splitResult.note: After making the request, and applying the above JSONata expression, if the result is an array and this box is checked, we will emit one message for each element of the array.
